name: Catacombs (itch) (alko08)
description:
A 3D mystery horror RPG set in Tisch Library. 

Created by Bill Xia, Alexander Koppel, and Aidan Barg.

Move with arrow keys or WASD! 

Sometimes the mouse gets uncentered due to the webGL client. To recenter the mouse, open the inventory and move the mouse over the crosshair before closing the inventory. Make sure to click into the game as well.
